title: A Rainbow of Food
description: A Rainbow of Food teaches students that eating healthy foods can be fun-and colorful. Readers also learn how different colored fruits and vegetables benefit their bodies. Detailed, supportive photographs, and high-frequency words support beginning readers.
reviewWords: cob, energy, healthy, snack, stomach, vitamins
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Identify main idea and details
awareness: Manipulate Medial Sounds                : Manipulate medial sounds
grammar: Prepositions : Recognize and use prepositions for and with
wordWork: Compound Words                : Understand and use compound words
